title: League Displays screensavers not showing
body:
Hello,
As title, I only get a black screen instead of my screensaver.
Any tips? Thank you

replies.body: Hey thanks for the report.  Are you still able to load the app?  There should be a report bug function on the bottom right to send details to the app's devs.  I don't have a lot of visibility on[ League Displays](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207525756) beyond our current FAQ, but I'm going to be collecting the threads I've seen so far today to try and get more info.
I am having the same problem btw

Yes of course, everything works except the screensaver.
I'll use the bug report function and give as many details as possible, thanks for the suggestion.
